016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Histogram;
019import com.codahale.metrics.Meter;
020import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.io.ByteBufferBackedInputStream;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientShutdownStreamException;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerTimeoutStreamException;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Marker;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.MarkerManager;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferAccumulator;
033import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
034import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.*;
035import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
036import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
037
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
040import java.nio.charset.Charset;
041import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
042import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
043import java.util.function.Function;
044
045/**
046 * @author rickardoberg
047 * @since 13/04/2022
048 */
049public class SubscriberSubscriptionReactiveStream
050        extends ServerReactiveStream
051        implements WebSocketPartialListener,
052        WebSocketConnectionListener,
053        Subscription {
054    private final Function<Configuration, Subscriber<Object>> subscriberFactory;
055    private String configurationMessage = "";
056    private Configuration subscriberConfiguration;
057    protected Subscriber<Object> subscriber;
058
059    protected final MessageReader<Object> eventReader;
060
061    protected final ByteBufferAccumulator byteBufferAccumulator;
062    protected final ByteBufferPool byteBufferPool;
063
064    protected final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
065    protected final Marker marker;
066    protected final Logger logger;
067
068    protected Session session;
069
070    protected final Meter received;
071    protected final Meter receivedBytes;
072    protected final Histogram requestsHistogram;
073
074    // Subscription
075    private final AtomicLong requests = new AtomicLong();
076    private boolean isCancelled;
077    private boolean isSendingRequests;
078
079    public SubscriberSubscriptionReactiveStream(String streamName,
080                                                Function<Configuration, Subscriber<Object>> subscriberFactory,
081                                                MessageReader<Object> eventReader,
082                                                ObjectMapper objectMapper,
083                                                ByteBufferPool byteBufferPool,
084                                                MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
085                                                Logger logger) {
086        this.subscriberFactory = subscriberFactory;
087        this.eventReader = eventReader;
088        this.objectMapper = objectMapper;
089        this.byteBufferPool = byteBufferPool;
090        this.byteBufferAccumulator = new ByteBufferAccumulator(byteBufferPool, false);
091        this.marker = MarkerManager.getMarker(streamName);
092        this.logger = logger;
093
094        this.received = metricRegistry.meter("subscriber." + streamName + ".received");
095        this.receivedBytes = metricRegistry.meter("subscriber." + streamName + ".received.bytes");
096        this.requestsHistogram = metricRegistry.histogram("subscriber." + streamName + ".requests");
097    }
098
099    // Subscription
100    @Override
101    public synchronized void request(long n) {
102        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
103            logger.trace(marker, "request {}", n);
104
105        if (isCancelled) {
106            return;
107        }
108        requests.addAndGet(n);
109        if (session != null)
110            CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::sendRequests);
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public synchronized void cancel() {
115        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
116            logger.trace(marker, "cancel");
117
118        isCancelled = true;
119        requests.set(Long.MIN_VALUE);
120        if (session != null)
121            CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::sendRequests);
122    }
123
124    // WebSocket
125    @Override
126    public synchronized void onWebSocketConnect(Session session) {
127        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
128            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketConnect {}", session.getRemoteAddress().toString());
129
130        this.session = session;
131        session.getRemote().setBatchMode(BatchMode.ON);
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    public synchronized void onWebSocketPartialText(String message, boolean fin) {
136        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
137            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketPartialText {} {}", message, fin);
138
139        if (subscriberConfiguration == null) {
140            configurationMessage += message;
141
142            if (fin) {
143                // Read JSON parameters
144                try {
145                    ObjectNode configurationJson = (ObjectNode) objectMapper.readTree(configurationMessage);
146                    subscriberConfiguration = new Configuration.Builder(configurationJson)
147                            .with(addUpgradeRequestConfiguration(session.getUpgradeRequest()))
148                            .build();
149                } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
150                    logger.error("Could not parse subscriber configuration", e);
151                    session.close(StatusCode.BAD_PAYLOAD, e.getMessage());
152                }
153
154                try {
155                    subscriber = subscriberFactory.apply(subscriberConfiguration);
156                    subscriber.onSubscribe(this);
157
158                    logger.debug(marker, "Connected to {}", session.getRemote().getRemoteAddress().toString());
159                } catch (Throwable e) {
160                    // TODO Send exception here
161                }
162            }
163        }
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public synchronized void onWebSocketPartialBinary(ByteBuffer payload, boolean fin) {
168        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
169            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketPartialBinary {} {}", fin, payload.limit());
170
171        byteBufferAccumulator.copyBuffer(payload);
172        if (fin) {
173            onWebSocketBinary(byteBufferAccumulator.takeByteBuffer());
174            byteBufferAccumulator.close();
175        }
176    }
177
178    protected void onWebSocketBinary(ByteBuffer byteBuffer) {
179        try {
180            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
181                logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketBinary {}", Charset.defaultCharset().decode(byteBuffer.asReadOnlyBuffer()).toString());
182            }
183            ByteBufferBackedInputStream inputStream = new ByteBufferBackedInputStream(byteBuffer);
184            Object event = eventReader.readFrom(inputStream);
185            received.mark();
186            receivedBytes.mark(byteBuffer.position());
187            byteBufferAccumulator.getByteBufferPool().release(byteBuffer);
188            subscriber.onNext(event);
189        } catch (Throwable e) {
190            logger.error("Could not receive value", e);
191            subscriber.onError(e);
192            session.close(StatusCode.BAD_PAYLOAD, e.getMessage());
193        }
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public synchronized void onWebSocketError(Throwable cause) {
198        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
199            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketError", cause);
200
201        switch (cause.getClass().getName()) {
202            case "java.nio.channels.AsynchronousCloseException",
203                    "org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.exceptions.WebSocketTimeoutException",
204                    "org.eclipse.jetty.io.EofException" -> {
205                // Do nothing
206            }
207            default -> {
208                logger.warn(marker, "Subscriber websocket error", cause);
209                if (subscriber != null) {
210                    subscriber.onError(cause);
211                }
212            }
213        }
214    }
215
216    @Override
217    public synchronized void onWebSocketClose(int statusCode, String reason) {
218        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
219            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketClose {} {}", statusCode, reason);
220
221        try {
222            if (statusCode == StatusCode.NORMAL) {
223                if (subscriber != null) {
224                    subscriber.onComplete();
225                }
226            } else if (statusCode == StatusCode.SHUTDOWN) {
227                if (subscriber != null) {
228                    Throwable throwable;
229                    if (reason.equals("Connection Idle Timeout")) {
230                        throwable = new ServerTimeoutStreamException(reason);
231                    } else {
232                        throwable = new ClientShutdownStreamException(reason);
233                    }
234                    subscriber.onError(throwable);
235                }
236            }
237        } catch (Exception e) {
238            logger.warn(marker, "Could not close subscription sink", e);
239        }
240    }
241
242    // Send requests
243    protected void sendRequests() {
244        try {
245
246            synchronized (this) {
247                if (isSendingRequests)
248                    return;
249
250                if (!session.isOpen()) {
251                    logger.debug(marker, "Session closed, cannot send requests");
252                    return;
253                }
254
255                isSendingRequests = true;
256            }
257
258            long rn;
259            while ((rn = requests.getAndSet(0)) != 0) {
260
261                if (rn != Long.MIN_VALUE)
262                    requestsHistogram.update(rn);
263                final long finalRn = rn;
264                session.getRemote().sendString(Long.toString(rn), new WriteCallback() {
265                    @Override
266                    public void writeFailed(Throwable x) {
267                        logger.error(marker, "Could not send requests {}", finalRn, x);
268                    }
269
270                    @Override
271                    public void writeSuccess() {
272                    }
273                });
274
275                try {
276                    session.getRemote().flush();
277                    logger.trace(marker, "Flushed remote session");
278                } catch (IOException e) {
279                    logger.error(marker, "While flushing remote session", e);
280                }
281            }
282        } catch (Throwable t) {
283            logger.error(marker, "Error sending requests", t);
284        } finally {
285            synchronized (this) {
286                isSendingRequests = false;
287            }
288        }
289    }
290}
